page.title: 03VILLAGE AMENITIES
page.content:
{ The Village of Pembury, Shops. }
The area around the Green is now built up, with housing on the two long sides. A large public house and public car park lie to the south. The shops in the village are mostly small, but are varied. They provide for the basic needs of the community who are in easy reach of excellent facilities in Tunbridge Wells. An adaptation to modern life can be seen in the Chinese takeaway which is about to open. Four years ago there was the suggestion that Pembury should have a supermarket. Planning delays and a public inquiry delayed the project. It is now felt that there is little hope of such a development as two supermarket stores are being developed in Tunbridge Wells.
